name: The Road to React
description: A comprehensive guide to learning React, covering everything from the basics to advanced topics.

name: React Beginner's Handbook
description: An in-depth handbook for beginners, providing a solid foundation in React with practical examples.

name: React Documentation
description: Official documentation covering all aspects of React, from components to state management.

name: Create React App
description: A comfortable environment for learning React, allowing you to set up new projects quickly.

name: React Router
description: A library for routing in React applications, enabling navigation between different views.

name: Redux
description: A predictable state container for JavaScript apps, often used with React to manage global state.

name: Context API
description: A way to pass data through the component tree without having to pass props down manually at every level.

name: Hooks API Reference
description: Official reference for all hooks available in React, including useState, useEffect, and more.

name: React Native Documentation
description: Official documentation covering the setup and development of React Native applications.
